pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
**Default: x="0.7" y="0" z="1.8" R="0" P="$\{radians\(15\)\}" Y="0" post\_Y="0"**

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/538477831-Working_Lidar_Post_1.png)
‌

**Test Pose \(x="0.6" y="0.1" z="1.4" R="$\{radians\(10\)\}" P="0" Y="0" post\_Y="$\{3\*pi/4\}"\)**

Lidar in `(x,y,z,R,P,Y)` of world frame and pole swivels around to meet it.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/511788071-Working_Lidar_Pose_3.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/599043625-Working_Lidar_Pose_2.png)
content.html:
Default: x="0.7" y="0" z="1.8" R="0" P="${radians(15)}" Y="0" post_Y="0"

‌

Test Pose (x="0.6" y="0.1" z="1.4" R="${radians(10)}" P="0" Y="0" post_Y="${3*pi/4}")

Lidar in (x,y,z,R,P,Y) of world frame and pole swivels around to meet it.

‌
